citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 PM on 18
August 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling the main number and the contact number for the
acting Critter Keeper and left messages. Received a call back quickly and the facility representative is not available today
and discussed optimal hours. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious
violation of the AWA and regulations.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 PM on 18 
August 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling the main number and the contact number for the 
acting Critter Keeper and left messages. Received a call back quickly and the facility representative is not available today 
and discussed optimal hours. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious 
violation of the AWA and regulations. 
 
 
End Section
